description: A large, heavy-duty leaf spring.  Probably from some car or truck, and looks an awful lot like a bow.  You can barely bend itâ€¦

An improvised explosive device cobbled together from parts.  Use this item to pull the pin and light the fuse.  You will then have about 5 seconds before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the makeshift grenade.

description: This is an active grenade, and will explode any second now.  Better throw it!

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already pulled the %s's pin; try throwing it instead.

description: A longer barrel increases the muzzle velocity of a firearm, contributing to both accuracy and damage but reduces portability and slows aiming.
Rifling a shotgun barrel is mainly done in order to improve its accuracy when firing slugs.  The rifling makes the gun less suitable for shot, however.
An improved blowback mechanism makes your firearm's automatic fire faster, at the cost of reduced accuracy and increased noise.
A simple mechanism that converts a pistol to a selective fire weapon with a burst size of three rounds.  However it reduces accuracy and increases noise.
Mechanism that allows your CW-24 rifle to fire in fully automatic mode.  It is handmade.
Replacing several key parts of a 9x19mm, .38, .40, 5.7mm, 4.6mm, 7.62x39mm or .223 firearm converts it to a .22 firearm.  The conversion results in a slight reduction to accuracy.

This kit is used to convert a shotgun, 5.45x39mm, 7.62x39mm, .30-06, or .308 rifle to the popular, accurate, and lighter .223 caliber.  The conversion results in slight reductions to both accuracy and ammo capacity.
This kit is used to convert a shotgun or 7.62x39mm, .223 or .30-06 rifle to the popular and powerful .308 caliber.  The conversion results in reduced ammo capacity and a slight reduction to accuracy.
Replacing several key parts of a 9x19mm, .38, .40 or .44 firearm converts it to a .45 firearm.  The conversion results in a slight reduction to accuracy.
A conversion kit produced by Heckler and Koch, used to convert .22, 9x19mm, or .38 firearms to their proprietary 4.6x30mm, a round designed for accuracy and armor penetration.
A conversion kit produced by FN Herstal, used to convert .22, 9x19mm, or .38 firearms to their proprietary 5.7x28mm, a round designed for accuracy and armor penetration.
Replacing several key parts of a 9x18mm, .38, .40, .44 or .45 firearm converts it to a 9x19mm firearm.  The conversion results in a slight reduction to accuracy.
A kit providing the necessary parts for permanently converting a firearm from magazine to belt-feed.  Guaranteed to void your warranty.
A set of finely tuned internal components which increase the precision and reliably of a firearm.

A favorite of hooligans around the world, this lighter duct-taped to a spray can is probably as dangerous to the user as anyone else.  The nozzle has been crudely modified to disperse gasoline, and a small pump attached to the side allows for repressurization, though this process takes a few minutes.

name: Magnesium Supplements
desc: You took some magnesium supplements.  These will help with sleep deprivation.

description: When this bionic is active, you can burn nearly any organic material as fuel (use 'E'), recharging your power level.  Some materials will burn better than others.
Space inside your chest cavity has been converted into a storage area.  You may carry an extra 2 liters of volume.
A simple, home-made flamethrower.  While its capacity is not superb, it is more than capable of igniting terrain and monsters alike.
This module upgrades a pre-installed microreactor with enhanced maximum yield and limited automatic radiation scrubbing capabilities.
A system of tanks and filters that are connected to a microreactor to extract plutonium from radioactive slurry.

This stripped down mini-reactor will generate impressive amounts of bionic power, but may not be the safest thing to install.  Once active, it cannot be shut down and will slowly contaminate the user's body with radiation.
A kit for upgrading a pre-installed microreactor with enhanced maximum yield and limited automatic radiation scrubbing capabilities.
This laser pistol was based on the V29 laser pistol designed in the mid-21st century.  While little more than duct tape and electronics, it runs on a standard UPS.
A pair of arm guards made from leather, reinforced with bone.  Light and strong.
Body armor consisting of a leather suit with strategically-placed bone reinforcement.  Light and strong.
Leather gauntlets with bone armor reinforcement.  Very light and strong.
A grotesque, horned helmet carved from bone.  Covers the entire head; very light and strong.
This is a homemade bomb consisting of a bottle filled with match heads and equipped with a fuse.  Use this item to light the fuse; you will, of course, need a lighter in your inventory to do this.

use_action.msg: You light the match head bomb.

description: This is a bottle filled with match heads and equipped with a fuse.  This one has been lit, and its fuse is rapidly burning down.  You may not want to hold onto it much longer.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the %s, try throwing it instead.

description: This is a tin can filled to the brim with black gunpowder and with a lit fuse stuck inside of it.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse - throw it!

description: A hydrangea stalk with some petals.
A hydrangea bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a hydrangea flower.
A tulip stalk with some petals.
A tulip bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a tulip flower.
A spurge stalk with some petals.
A spurge bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a spurge flower.
A black eyed susan stalk with some petals.
A black eyed susan bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a black eyed susan flower.
A lily stalk with some petals.
A lily bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a lily flower.
A lotus stalk with some petals.
A lotus bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a lotus flower.
A lilac stalk with some petals.
A lilac bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a lilac flower.
A rose bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a rose flower.
A dahlia bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a dahlia.
A rose stalk with some petals.
A bluebell stalk with some petals.
A dahlia stalk with some petals.
A poppy stalk with some petals.
A bluebell bud.  Contains some substances commonly produced by a bluebell flower.
This is a small improvised wood stove, made from a metal can or similar container of the right size.  Useful for defrosting and reheating food, uses simple tinder.
A 40mm signal flare.  It will burn brightly for up to a minute, and will also leave a streak of smoke cover in its wake.
A 40mm grenade with a flashbang load.  It will detonate with a blast of light and sound, designed to blind, deafen, and disorient anyone nearby.
A 40mm grenade with a small napalm load, designed to create a burst of flame.
A 40mm grenade designed to provide smoke cover.
A 40mm shell loaded with a massive bullet.  Say goodbye to your shoulder, I guess.

Bearing the logo of Northrop, those are assembly plans, design specs, and technical drawings for the chicken walker.  Most of this is useless to you, but you could use the assembly plans to re-assemble the robot from salvaged parts.

Bearing the logo of Northrop, those are assembly plans, design specs, and technical drawings for the tank drone.  Most of this is useless to you, but you could use the assembly plans to re-assemble the robot from salvaged parts.

Bearing the logo of Honda, those are assembly plans, design specs, and technical drawings for the tripod.  Most of this is useless to you, but you could use the assembly plans to re-assemble the robot from salvaged parts.

This is an inactive chicken walker.  Using this item involves placing it on the ground, loading the unit with the factory-loaded 5.56 rounds and 40mm cartridge grenades in your inventory (if you wish to divide your ammunition, set aside whatever ammunition you do NOT want to give the robot) and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the chicken walker will then identify you as a friendly, roam around or follow you, and attack all enemies with a built-in firearm and grenade launcher.

use_action.friendly_msg: The chicken walker rises to its feet, sways away from you and begins surveying the area.
use_action.hostile_msg: The chicken walker whirrs and aims directly at you. Take cover!
use_action.//: Milspec, but was deployed in active service implying a reliable IFF

description: This is an inactive Beagle Mini-Tank UGV.  Using this item involves placing it on the ground, loading the unit with the factory-loaded 5.56 rounds and 40mm cartridge grenades in your inventory (if you wish to divide your ammunition, set aside whatever ammunition you do NOT want to give the robot) and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the tank drone will then identify you as a friendly, roam around or follow you, and attack all enemies with a built-in firearm and grenade launcher.
//: cheating a bit with the volume due to lack of proper vehicle storage options

use_action.friendly_msg: The tank drone rolls out and begins acquiring targets.
use_action.hostile_msg: The tank drone swivels its turret and aims directly at you. Don your brown pants!
use_action.//: Milspec, clearly designed with little concern for collateral damage. What did you expect of a robo-tank?

description: A broken chicken walker.  Still looks intimidating despite being permanently inoperative, possibly due to the sheer size and mass.  Could be gutted for parts.

use_action.friendly_msg: The chicken bot rolls out and begins acquiring targets.
use_action.hostile_msg: The chicken bot swivels its turret and aims directly at you.  Don your brown pants!
use_action.//: Milspec, clearly designed with little concern for collateral damage.  What did you expect of a chicken walker?

description: This is an inactive Honda Regnal.  Using this item involves placing it on the ground, wondering how it fuels its flamethrower and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the tribot will then identify you as an ally, roam around or follow you, and impale hostiles with its spiked cable weapons.

use_action.friendly_msg: The tribot rises to its feet and scans the area for contaminants.
use_action.hostile_msg: The tribot glowers down at you and ignites its flamethrower. Turns out you hate the smell of napalm.
use_action.//: No observed open deployment, likely a prototype or secret project

description: A broken tribot.  Now that its legs lie broken and immobile, the world seems a little less threatening.  Could be gutted for parts.
A broken tank drone.  Still looks intimidating despite being permanently inoperative, possibly due to the sheer size and mass.  Could be gutted for parts.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the tripod.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the chicken walker.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Beagle tank.
The 120mm cannon from a tankbot.  If you have this, you'd best be debugging!
A set of big pointy legs, like the ones found under a tripod.
A large stone, roughly hollowed out into a pot.
A rusty receiver, a R700 pattern barrel and half a broken crutch; all held together in the shape of a rifle with nothing more than glue, duct tape, and generous amounts of faith.

This is a large blade with a fuel pipe on the side, and a small tank and igniter built into the insulated hilt.  When filled with gasoline, the blade can be made scorching hot to singe enemies and light your way.  Use to ignite.

use_action.failure_message: Aw, dangit.  It fails to start!

description: This is a large blade with a fuel pipe on the side, and a small tank and igniter built into the insulated hilt.  The blade is glowing brightly.  Use to shut off the gas.

use_action.auto_extinguish_message: Bummer, man!  Your shishkebab's flame flickers and dies out.
use_action.voluntary_extinguish_message: Peace out.  Your shishkebab's flame dies.
use_action.charges_extinguish_message: Uncool, outta gas!  Your shishkebab's flame goes out.
use_action.water_extinguish_message: Your shishkebab hisses in the water and goes out.

description: This huge steel knife has been modified with a fuel tank, insulated handguard, and ignition system.  When filled with gasoline, a system of torches heats the blade, burning your target.
This huge steel knife has been modified with a fuel tank, insulated handguard, and ignition system.  The blade is glowing with heat, making it a great plant scorcher and nightlight.

use_action.water_extinguish_message: Your No. 9 hisses in the water and goes out.

description: This is a katana with a nozzle just behind the cutting edge of the blade.  People love fire, and people love katanas, so why not put them together?  The gas burners attached to this blade can really turn up the heat on your foes.  Use to ignite.
This is a katana that glows with the fury and heat of the SUN!  Well, okay it's not THAT hot, but getting hit with it still stings like the dickens.  Use to shut off the gas.

use_action.water_extinguish_message: Your sword hisses in the water and goes out.

description: This is a combination of two Dark Age conflict-resolution classics, the broadsword and the torch.  Use to light it up and show those heathen zombies who's Lord around here.
This is a combination of two Dark Age conflict-resolution classics, the broadsword and the torch.  The blade is glowing with heat.  Excalibur can eat its heart out.  Use to shut it off.

use_action.water_extinguish_message: Your sword hisses in the water and goes out.

//: All of this is SUPPOSED to be in German.
description: Ein groÃŸes zweihÃ¤ndiges Schwert aus Deutschland, an dessen Klinge sich, unter ZufÃ¼hrung von Benzin, eine anhaltende Flamme erzeugen lÃ¤sst.  Es ist eine sehr mÃ¤chtige Waffe.

use_action.lacks_fuel_message: Dein Flammenschwert hat keinen Brennstoff mehr.

//: All of this is SUPPOSED to be in German.
description: Ein groÃŸes zweihÃ¤ndiges Schwert aus Deutschland, an dessen Klinge sich, unter ZufÃ¼hrung von Benzin, eine anhaltende Flamme erzeugen lÃ¤sst.  Es ist eine sehr mÃ¤chtige Waffe.

use_action.noise_message: Das Feuer um deine Schwertklinge leuchtet hell!
use_action.charges_extinguish_message: Deinem Flammenschwert ist der Brennstoff ausgegangen!

description: A sturdy wood bat, wrapped in flame-resistant Nomex fabric.  Makes a good melee weapon but better be disassembled to recycle the baseball bat and some Nomex patches.
This is sturdy wood bat, wrapped in gasoline-soaked rags and flame-resistant Nomex fabric.  Light it, and the ball game will REALLY heat up.  You'll need a lighter or matches to light it.

This is a sturdy wood bat, wrapped in gasoline-soaked rags and flame-resistant Nomex fabric.  It is burning brightly, and makes it much easier to see the baselines at night games (It also makes the umpire FAR more likely to call a ball instead of a strike).
A customized, heavily armored Kevlar helmet, modified with leather reinforcements to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.
A massive customized, heavily armored Kevlar helmet, modified with leather reinforcements to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.
A customized, heavily armored steel and Kevlar helmet, modified to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.  All the added material has made it rather heavy.

The logical extension of Leadworks' autorevolver series, this massive 'sidearm' fires 5.56 NATO to share ammo with a soldier's rifle.  The muzzle flash and report of this 5-shot revolver are incredible, producing ballistics similar to .357 Magnum.  Similar to other Leadworks products it doesn't accept third-party modifications.
This speedloader, made by Leadworks for use with L2037 Backup revolver, can hold 5 rounds of .223 and quickly reload a compatible revolver.
A bootleg adapter for permanently converting a firearm to accept proprietary Leadworks magazines.  Guaranteed to void your warranty.
A Leadworks built in longer barrel increases the muzzle velocity of a firearm, contributing to both accuracy and damage.
A Leadworks built in heavy duty barrel especially designed for prolonged shooting.  Increases damage output and weapon range.
This custom-built miniature flamethrower is made to be attached to almost any sort of firearm, greatly expanding its lethality.
This is a steel pipe, containing a mixture of RDX and sand, the former propelling the latter into a deadly mist of vicious shrapnel.  Use this item to light the fuse.

explosion.//: Fire exposure would burn away the RDX, leaving the HMTD detonator as nearly the sole source of the blast.

use_action.msg: You light the fuse on the sand bomb.  Throw it!

description: This is a steel pipe, containing a mixture of RDX and sand, the former propelling the latter into a deadly mist of vicious shrapnel.  The fuse has been lit, so why are you still holding it?

explosion.//: Fire exposure would burn away the RDX, leaving the HMTD detonator as nearly the sole source of the blast.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse - what are you waiting for?

description: This system lets the user visually sense their own scent, making it possible for them to recognize their surroundings even in complete darkness.

name: quantum solar panel
description: This solar panel is obviously cutting-edge technology and given where you found it, should probably provide a LOT of power.  It's covered in strange-looking material, but the covering looks rather fragile; it doesn't look like it could support a reinforcing sheet, either.

Personal portable charging system consisting of an array of quantum solar panels neatly folded in a form of a large backpack.  It can be worn as one, and has an integrated cable to plug it into a cable charger system.  Cutting edge technology.
Unfolded array of portable quantum solar panels ready to push some power into an active cable charger system.
A multistroke pneumatic rifle handcrafted from scrap.  It is very quiet and deadly.
An eight-shot, revolving barrel, pneumatic bolt driver handcrafted from scrap.  It is very quiet and deadly.

A double-barreled pneumatic air shotgun handcrafted from scrap.  Though it's firepower is lacking compared to more conventional shotguns, this thing can still pack quite a punch.  That is, if your target is directly in front of you.
A powerful handheld launcher handcrafted from scrap.  Made to launch modified handheld nuclear weapons, it is an exceedingly powerful weapon.

This overpowered and overengineered variant of the ferromagnetic rail rifle was designed to deliver electromagnetically-driven obliteration right through whatever obstacles that lies in front of it, be it buildings, vehicles or hordes of walking dead.  However, the hefty bulk and weight of this weapon compared to most contemporary rifles makes it somewhat cumbersome to wield; not to mention that it consumes UPS charges at a tremendous rate, making it impractical for use in prolonged engagements.

A single-shot, electrically propelled, steel rail launcher handcrafted from scrap.  The hypervelocity metal stake that it fires is accelerated to the point of spontaneous combustion by a Lorentz force generated by electromagnetic induction, powered by a standard UPS.

//: Hard to make, plentiful and cheap ammo, and silent - people will want this thing.
description: A homemade gun, using electromagnets to accelerate a ferromagnetic projectile to high velocity.  Powered by UPS.

This is a nailgun that has been extensively modified with the addition of a short barrel, stock and hand guard.  It can be reloaded using detachable magazines and is an overall much more effective weapon.
An improvised magazine for use with a nail rifle.  Little more than a tin can, spring and some duct tape it is awkward to reload and not especially reliable.
The authors of this thoroughly researched and documented proposal make a very persuasive case for the adoption of spring-driven nuclear shells.  It's stamped "DENIED".

A heavily modified handheld nuclear device on a rocket.  Intended to be fired from a specialized launcher, it has been rigged to explode on impact instead of on a timer.  It can fly further than the explosion will reach, probably.

name: tainted tornado
description: A frothing slurry of alcohol-soaked zombie flesh and rotten blood, it smells almost as bad as it looks.  Has weak mutagenic properties.

name: sewer brew
description: A thirsty mutant's drink of choice.  It tastes horrible but it's probably a lot safer to drink than before.
A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  It has pouches for extra armor inserts, but without them provides little more protection over a regular vest.  It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.

A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Ceramic plates have been inserted to improve its protection.  The ceramic plates cannot be repaired, only replaced.  It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.

A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Hardened steel plates have been inserted, greatly increasing its protection at the cost of a great deal of weight and loss of flexibility.  It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.
A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Kevlar plates have been inserted to improve its protection.  It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.

A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Its armor pouches have steel plates in them; this improves protection, but makes the vest much heavier and encumbering.  It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.

A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Its armor pouches have superalloy plating in them, giving it extra protection with marginal flexibility loss and additional weight.  It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.
This small paper canister resembling a crude shotshell is filled to the brim with assorted pieces of scrap metal.
This small paper canister resembling a crude shotshell is filled to the brim with tiny pebbles.  Damage is pathetic but flight is much more stable than scrap.
This small paper canister resembling a crude shotshell is filled to the brim with handmade flechettes, giving it some armor piercing capabilities.
This small paper canister resembling a crude shotshell is filled to the brim with handmade bearings, stabilizing its flight pattern a tiny bit.
A modified laptop, now capable of transmitting in the ultra-high frequencies utilized by robots.  Activate it to command robots from afar.

Intended to replace the AK-74, this rifle uses a sophisticated mechanism to delay felt recoil, along with a very fast two-round burst mode.  While its increased complexity prevented it from being adopted by the Russian military, it has seen service among their special forces.

This is an inactive laser turret.  Using this item involves turning it on and placing it on the ground, where it will attach itself.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the turret will identify you as a friendly, and attack all enemies with its revolving laser cannons.  It requires sunlight in order to fire.
A laser cannon stripped from the barrel of a TX-5LR Cerberus laser turret.  Unusable as a weapon on its own without the necessary parts.
This is a laser cannon stripped from the barrel of a TX-5LR Cerberus laser turret that has been modified to use UPS power for firing.
Bone plating made for a vehicle.
